abstract: The Giants' Mathias Kiwanuka recorded six tackles, a sack and a forced fumble, showing he has not forgotten any of his old techniques.
snippet: The Giants' Mathias Kiwanuka recorded six tackles, a sack and a forced fumble, showing he has not forgotten any of his old techniques.
lead_paragraph: A capsule look at the Giants' 27-24 victory over the Bills on Sunday:

headline.main: Kiwanuka and Ballard Give Giants Lift Against Bills
